allIssues.title: Missing RTL layout for icons
allIssues.description: The icons in the bottom buttons are not mirrored for RTL layout. They should be on the left side of the text.
allIssues.suggestion: Mirror the icons for RTL languages. For example the suitcase icon should be on the left side of the text "تسجيل الدخول كمزود خدمة".

allIssues.title: Incorrect text direction
allIssues.description: The phrases 'تسجيل الدخول / إنشاء حساب' and 'تسجيل الدخول كمزود خدمة' should be right-aligned and the slash should be visually reversed or replaced.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust text alignment to RTL and replace slash with appropriate symbol for RTL languages.

allIssues.title: English text
allIssues.description: The word 'English' at the top right corner is in English. This should be in Arabic.
allIssues.suggestion: Translate to Arabic.

allIssues.title: English text not RTL aligned
allIssues.description: The word "English" should be right-aligned and its globe icon should be on the right side
allIssues.suggestion: Make the language selector follow the right to left flow.

allIssues.title: English text in top corner.
allIssues.description: The 'English' text in the corner should be dynamically loaded based on language and in Arabic
allIssues.suggestion: Translate the button into Arabic. Use localization files to dynamically load text

allIssues.title: Inconsistent text direction in subtitle
allIssues.description: The subtitle mixes RTL (Arabic) with LTR (English) which might confuse the user. The phrase "أسهل طريقة لإدارة دعواتك وتنظيم مناسباتك الخاصة" is displayed correctly in RTL but the numbers within it might be formatted incorrectly.
allIssues.suggestion: Ensure all text and numbers follow RTL formatting conventions.

allIssues.title: Button text contrast
allIssues.description: The contrast ratio between the button text color and the background color is low. Consider improving it for accessibility to ensure that the text is easily readable, especially for those with vision impairments.
allIssues.suggestion: Slightly darken or brighten the background color of the button, or the font color to increase contrast.

allIssues.title: English language setting inconsistent with Arabic UI
allIssues.description: While the main content is in Arabic, the language selector is in English. This creates visual inconsistency.
allIssues.suggestion: Change the language selector to Arabic or use a flag icon to make its purpose clearer.

allIssues.title: English language toggle text
allIssues.description: The text 'English' in the language toggle is in English and has a left to right direction. It should be in Arabic and RTL.
allIssues.suggestion: Replace the text with Arabic for 'English' (الإنجليزية) and ensure RTL layout.

allIssues.title: Icon alignment in button
allIssues.description: The icon next to 'تسجيل الدخول كمزود خدمة' is on the wrong side for RTL layout. Should be on the right.
allIssues.suggestion: Flip the icon to the right side of the text.

allIssues.title: English text in RTL context
allIssues.description: The word 'English' is written in English instead of Arabic, but the button should switch the application's language.
allIssues.suggestion: The button should display the Arabic translation 'العربية'.

allIssues.title: Animation label is in English
allIssues.description: The 'Animation' label should be translated into Arabic.
allIssues.suggestion: Translate 'Animation' to Arabic.

allIssues.title: English language button on the right.
allIssues.description: The language selection button should either have an Arabic abbreviation of language or not be on the right side.
allIssues.suggestion: Move the English language button to the left.

allIssues.title: Inconsistent spacing near 'دعوتي'
allIssues.description: The spacing between the app logo and the app name 'دعوتي' seems slightly larger than the spacing between 'دعوتي' and the app description text.  This can be visually distracting.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust the spacing to be consistent, aiming for visual balance.
allIssues.location: Center of the screen, above buttons

allIssues.title: Small touch target
allIssues.description: The language selection icon (globe) appears small, which could be difficult to tap, especially for users with motor impairments.
allIssues.suggestion: Increase the size of the touch target for the language selection.

allIssues.title: Missing shadow for buttons
allIssues.description: The buttons have no shadow, making them look flat. Adding shadow would increase contrast and make them more clearly defined from the background.
allIssues.suggestion: Add a subtle shadow to the buttons.

allIssues.title: Animation text misplaced
allIssues.description: The "Animation" text is too close to the loading indicator, making it look cramped.
allIssues.suggestion: Increase the spacing between the text and the loading indicator.
allIssues.location: Top of the screen, below the app icon

allIssues.title: Inconsistent text styling
allIssues.description: The "Animation" text above the logo has different styling compared to other text on the page.
allIssues.suggestion: Use the same font and size as the other descriptive text.
allIssues.location: Top of screen, below progress bar.

allIssues.title: English language toggle position
allIssues.description: The English language toggle should be on the left in an RTL layout.
allIssues.suggestion: Move the English language toggle to the left side of the screen.

allIssues.title: Logo animation label is LTR
allIssues.description: The 'Animation' text is displayed LTR and should be translated into Arabic.
allIssues.suggestion: Translate into Arabic and display as RTL.
allIssues.location: Top of screen, above the logo

allIssues.title: Inconsistent Spacing
allIssues.description: Spacing between elements (e.g., app name, description, and buttons) seems slightly inconsistent.
allIssues.suggestion: Standardize spacing using a consistent spacing scale across the app.
allIssues.location: Between the logo, app name, description, and buttons

allIssues.title: Small touch targets for buttons
allIssues.description: The buttons "تسجيل الدخول / إنشاء حساب" and "تسجيل الدخول كمزود خدمة" could benefit from increased padding for better touch target sizes, improving accessibility.
allIssues.suggestion: Increase button size and padding around the text.

allIssues.title: Missing icon for "عن التطبيق" button
allIssues.description: The "عن التطبيق" button does not have an associated icon, reducing its visual appeal and clarity. This icon should relate to information or app details.
allIssues.suggestion: Add an appropriate icon to the "عن التطبيق" button for visual consistency and clarity.

allIssues.title: Animation text misplaced
allIssues.description: The word 'Animation' is not centered properly under the progress indicator.
allIssues.suggestion: Center the text correctly.
allIssues.location: Top of screen, below the logo

allIssues.title: Slightly off-centered logo
allIssues.description: The 'D' logo inside the colored circle seems slightly off-center.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust the logo to ensure it is perfectly centered within the circle.

allIssues.title: Alignment of text labels
allIssues.description: The text labels under the app icon do not appear to be perfectly center-aligned with each other.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust the alignment of the text labels to ensure they are visually centered.

allIssues.title: Version number alignment
allIssues.description: The version number 'v1.0.0' in the top left corner is visually close to the edge.
allIssues.suggestion: Add some padding to the left of the text to improve visual balance.

allIssues.title: Missing spacing for terms and conditions
allIssues.description: The 'عن التطبيق' text is too close to the bottom of the view. It should have additional padding.
allIssues.suggestion: Add spacing to the text.

allIssues.title: Animation element size is too small.
allIssues.description: The 'Animation' element is small and hard to see. Its size should be adjusted
allIssues.suggestion: Increase the size of the animation label

allIssues.title: Rounded edges should be more pronounced
allIssues.description: The rounded edges on the buttons are too subtle, especially given the overall aesthetic
allIssues.suggestion: Increase the border-radius of the buttons

allIssues.title: Button text color contrast
allIssues.description: The text color of the button labels is too similar to the background color.
allIssues.suggestion: Slightly darken the button labels to ensure better contrast and readability.

allIssues.title: Spacing inconsistency
allIssues.description: The spacing between the app logo and the title is slightly different from the spacing between the title and the subtitle.
allIssues.suggestion: Standardize the spacing to create visual consistency.
allIssues.location: Between the app logo, title, and subtitle

allIssues.title: Small touch targets
allIssues.description: The language selection button in the top right corner may be too small to be easily tapped, especially on smaller devices.
allIssues.suggestion: Increase the size of the touch target, including padding around the icon.

allIssues.title: Text color contrast
allIssues.description: The contrast between the text and the background color in the bottom buttons is a little low. It might be hard to read for some users.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust the text or background color to improve contrast.
